desc: Our inspiration began in Bologna, the epicentre of pasta and the capital of artisian food in Italy. After many hours of perfecting our pasta. we are proud to offer a product that is pure, unadulterated and melt in the mouth delicious. Bon Appetit!

layout.text: Guaranteed melt-in-your-mouth pasta. Freshly made in Templestowe.

Our inspiration began in Bologna, the epicentre of pasta and the capital of artisian food in Italy. After many hours of perfecting our pasta, we are proud to offer a product that is pure, unadulterated and melt-in-the-mouth delicious. Buon appetito!
